page.title: 09A DAY IN THE LIFE CONTINUED
page.content: 10.00 We wrote out our spellings. 10.30 We wrote a cat poem. 11.00 We had just come in from play. 11.30 We wrote about cats. 12.00 We had lunchtime prayers 12.30 We had lunch.We had toasties with butter an strawberry jam.1.00 We had lunch play.We played corner spry.1.30 We finished our cat poems. 2.00 We finished our cat poem 2.30 Doing drawings.3.00 Getting ready to go home.3.30 We were playing runaways.4.00 Getting ready for riding.4.30 Putting up Pauls and Sarahs tent.5.00 Had tea.We had spinach and cheese sauce.5.30 Cleaning my bike which is red.6.00 Put on my pyjamas.6.30 We played ball.7.00 Watched Wogan.7.30 went to bed .8.00 went to sleep.
